name: DnD Adventure: Rogue's Choice
description:
You're a rogue...

With debts to pay to the underworld, you need to make a lot of coin fast! Perhaps worse, you're wanted by the King's men for desertion. Survival is your first priority, but can you thrive in the ruthless streets of Ring City? On top of this, can you discover the secret within the walls of the city... And beneath!

Play the lovable scoundrel who just wants to enjoy his short time in this dimension!

The game includes the complete story of Rogue's Choice in 22 chapters. No additional purchase.


Zero learning curve. Read the story and make decisions.

Outcomes are determined by decisions you make.

More than 570,000 words for 32+ hours of gameplay.

Stay alive and sane. Use your rogue's talents and gather gold!

Score and rank at the end.

Ambient sounds and music.

Comfort options: 8 different fonts to choose from. Tweak the font size, screen luminosity and scroll speed to your needs without restarting.

Auto & Cloud Saves: Restart where you stopped from any of your devices.

A game by Delight Games & Cold Coffee Studio.
Story written by Sam Landstrom.
